Name: Release track
Description: A Release Track is a track as it appears on a particular music release. A release track may only appear on a single release. However, a single recording of a piece of music may have several release tracks - one for each release the recording is used on.

Properties.Name: Length
Properties.Description: The length of this release track.

Properties.Name: Release
Properties.Description: The release that this track is listed on.

Properties.Name: Track #
Properties.Description: The track number of this recording on this release.
